src:
Anggap Messi dan Ronaldo Monster, Sadio Mane: Saya Tak Ada Apa-Apanya Dibanding Mereka
03 Nov 2019, 17:17 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bintang Liverpool, Sadio Mane memilih untuk merendah dengan menyebut dirinya masih jauh ketimbang dua sosok paling beken dalam sepak bola saat ini, Lionel Messi dan Cristiano Ronaldo.
Mane masuk dalam daftar 30 pemain calon peraih penghargaan pemain terbaik dunia Ballon d'Or edisi 2019 ini. Bomber asal Senegal itu pun diyakini memiliki peluang cukup besar untuk meraihnya.
Tahun lalu dominasi Messi dan Ronaldo yang sudah berlangsung selama satu dekade berhasil dihentikan oleh Luka Modric. Jadi, bukan tidak mungkin tahun ini bakal ada pemenang baru lagi.
text:
Assuming Messi and Ronaldo are Monsters, Sadio Mane: I have nothing compared to them
Nov 03 2019, 17:17 by Bola.net
Liverpool - Liverpool star Sadio Mane has chosen to be modest by calling himself still far from the two most popular figures in football today, Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo.
Mane was included in the list of 30 players nominating for the 2019 edition of the world's best Ballon d'Or player. Bomber from Senegal was also believed to have a big enough opportunity to achieve it.
Last year the dominance of Messi and Ronaldo which had lasted for a decade was successfully stopped by Luka Modric. So, it is not impossible this year there will be a new winner again.
